skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places an extra hit if the enemy has a [Provoke] debuff.

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Places a [Provoke] debuff on them for 1 turn. Places a 30% [Reflect Damage] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Also places a [Counterattack] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.

skills.desc: If an enemy with a [Provoke] debuff attacks, has a 40% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff on them for 1 turn. Each hit taken will reduce damage taken by 5% (up to 30% in one round).
skills.name: Bravado [Passive]
